parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.70
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Collects all loaded [[magazines]] from all [[handgunWeapon]] muzzles and returns them in [[Array]], otherwise it returns []. This command is used for infantry weapons only.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''handgunMagazine''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[handgunMagazine]] [[player]]; //["16Rnd_9x21_Mag"]
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_array <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[handgunMagazine]] [[player]];
[[if]] ([[count]] _array > 0) [[then]] {
	[[hint]] ("Handgun is loaded with " + (_array [[select]] 0) + "!");
} [[else]] {
	[[if]] ([[handgunWeapon]] [[player]] != "") [[then]] {
		[[hint]] "Handgun is not loaded!";
	} [[else]] {
		[[hint]] "Player doesn't have a handgun!";
	};
};
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[handgunWeapon]], [[handgunItems]], [[addHandgunItem]], [[removeHandgunItem]], [[removeAllHandgunItems]], [[primaryWeaponMagazine]], [[secondaryWeaponMagazine]], [[binocularMagazine]]
</value></part></template></root>
